<script type="text/javascript">
    

    function radMenuOnClick(sender, args) {

        var state = args.get_item().get_attributes().getAttribute("ExpandOnClick");
        args.get_item().get_attributes().setAttribute("ExpandOnClick", "true")
        args.get_item().open();
    }

    function radMenuOnOpening(sender, args) {
        var state = args.get_item().get_attributes().getAttribute("ExpandOnClick");
        if(state != "true")
            args.set_cancel(true);
        args.get_item().get_attributes().setAttribute("ExpandOnClick", "false")
    }
</script>

<div id="HeaderPlaceHolder_T1453C44A018_LoginSF4_loginTop" class="news-list">
    
   
    <span class="content-container-Home clearfix">
          
<table id="HeaderPlaceHolder_T1453C44A018_LoginSF4_tblLogin" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0">
		<tr>
			<td valign="top" colspan="2" class="style1">
                    <span id="HeaderPlaceHolder_T1453C44A018_LoginSF4_lblError"><font color="Crimson"></font></span>

            <div id="content">
                <div id="contentLeft">
                    <div class="Userlogin">
                        

                    </div>
                    <div id="">
                        

                    </div>
                    

                </div>
                <div id="contentMiddle">
                    
<div class="sfContentBlock">
	<h1><a href="http://www.aam-us.org/about-us/media-room/new-national-data-reveals-the-economic-impact-of-museums-is-more-than-double-previous-estimates">New Data Reveals Broad Economic Impact &amp; Public Support for Museums</a></h1> <p>Two new reports from the Alliance show that museums contribute $50 billion to US economy each year, support 726,000 jobs, and are valued by all Americans from conservatives to liberals, from urban to rural, whether they are museum-goers or not.</p> <hr />



</div>
                    
<div class="sfContentBlock">
	<h1><a href="http://www.aam-us.org/events/leading-forward/?utm_source=aam-us.org&amp;utm_medium=1b">On March 23-24: Shape the Future of Your Historic Site</a></h1> <p>Join us at George Washington's Mount Vernon in Alexandria, VA to connect with historic site leaders and discuss the opportunities and challenges we face in our everyday practice. This two-day summit will include keynotes, case studies, breakout discussions, and tours of the estate. The deadline to register is March 16. </p> <hr />



</div>
                    

                </div>
                
                <div id="contentRight">
                    <div style="float: left; width: 100%;">
                        <div id="searchcorner" style="float: left; height: 33px; width: 34px;">
                            &nbsp;</div>
                        <div class="searchbackground" style="float: left; width: 275px;">
                            <div style="margin-top: 4px; padding-right: 15px;">
                    

                        </div>
                    </div>
                    
<div class="sfContentBlock">
	<h2><a href="/resources/careers">Find Jobs / Hire Talent  </a></h2> <p>Museums are hiring! Find listings in <a href="http://www.aam-us.org/resources/careers">JobHQ</a>.</p> <hr /> <h2><a href="http://community.aam-us.org/"></a></h2> <h2><a target="_blank" href="http://community.aam-us.org">Online Community</a></h2> <p>Join the discussion on <a href="http://www.aam-us.org/resources/careers">Museum Junction</a>. Ask or answer questions from your colleagues.</p> <hr /> <h2><a target="_blank" href="http://labs.aam-us.org">Experimenting Together</a></h2> <p>Step behind the scenes in <a href="http://labs.aam-us.org/">Alliance Labs</a> to learn what we&rsquo;re working on with our partners.</p> <hr /> <h2><a href="/resources/center-for-the-future-of-museums">What Lies Ahead</a></h2> <p>Help your museum stay on top of changes and challenges with the <a href="http://www.aam-us.org/resources/center-for-the-future-of-museums">Center for the Future of Museums</a>.</p> <hr />



</div>
